name: !SpaceBattle
description:
Simple space battle Arcade game. Just try it for fun!
Features:
- Choose your own spaceship! Customize your own gaming experience for every new game!

- Dynamically generated levels! The environment also changes for every new game that you play

- Infinite Levels! Dynamically generated levels allow us to provide you with limitless fun and enjoyment!

- Automatic Save! You can leave the game and head back to work whenever you want, and pick up right from where you left off, even if the game is not running in the background anymore!

Good luck to you!
